name: Thrasher (korvyashka)
description:
47 N A D

<<Waiting city>>

Mankind has gained immortality and fell into a bondage of ambition. 

Money, advertising, remasters, products, lots of products, an incalculable number of products.

The new generation will never forget their ancestors.

What word will they remember us with? 

Find out by trying on a suit: “Garbage Collector 3000"!
